channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Despite JT Toppin's 35-point performance, Illinois outlasted Texas Tech
item.description: Red Raiders' forward JT Toppin shot 12-of-14 in the second half, but Kylan Boswell and No. 14 Illinois overcame No. 11 Texas Tech.

item.title: Andrej Stojakovic finishes tough and-1, extending Illinois lead over Texas Tech
item.description: Andrej Stojakovic finished a tough and-1 play to extend the Illinois Fighting Illini's lead over the Texas Tech Red Raiders.

item.title: No. 11 Texas Tech Red Raiders vs. No. 14 Illinois Fighting Illini Highlights | FOX College Hoops
item.description: Check out the best moments and plays in this ranked matchup between the No. 11 Texas Tech Red Raiders and the No. 14 Illinois Fighting Illini.

item.title: Best of NFL Week 10 Press Conferences | NFL on FOX
item.description: Check out the best moments from NFL Press Conferences' in Week 10!

item.title: Why Stephen Vogt Was Again a Deserving Choice as AL Manager of the Year
item.description: Cleveland’s historic finish, during which Stephen Vogt kept the belief of a Guardians team, was enough to sway my vote for AL Manager of the Year.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United eye Wolves' João Gomes
item.description: Manchester United are considering a move for Wolverhampton Wanderers midfielder João Gomes. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.
